instructions: Tap the underlined date or time in the message, then choose Create Event . Or, go to the top of the email and tap Add . It should say something like " Siri found 1 Event." Fill out the calendar event. Choose a title if it wasn't already chosen, enter a location, and add notes. Also, verify that the date and time are accurate, and make any needed changes. Tap Add to save the email event details to your calendar.
